mainText:
I did comps with glue and paper, ideas with tissue and type with hot  
wax....and then they brought a Mac into work and everything I had  
learned in college and every skill I had mastered as a graphic  
designer up to that moment went flying out the window. It was a train  
that you had to jump onâ€“or get left behind. I jumped and have never  
looked back. Every day, every project, every computer...it's been a  
love and a joy. Thanks Steve and every one at Apple. Please keep the  
train rolling!
author: Sandra
